examples.text: Mr. <w>Risley</w> has lived in this neighborhood for over twenty years.
We are trying to trace the genealogy of the <w>Risley</w> family.

senses.sense_definition: A place in England, such as a suburb in Cheshire or a village in Derbyshire.

examples.text: The train passed through <w>Risley</w> on its way to the city.
She grew up in a small cottage in <w>Risley</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A circus performer who lies on their back and juggles or balances objects or people with their feet.

examples.text: The <w>Risley</w> amazed the audience by spinning a large barrel with his feet.
Every classic circus troupe included at least one talented <w>Risley</w>.
